TopicTitle: Senior docking port as root part

Articles.Content:
I was going to save my lifter using the sr port as root part, but look like only the jr port and the not shielded one can be used as root part, I went to the cfg of sr port and changed this:

//attachRules = 1,0,1,0,0

in this

attachRules = 1,0,1,1,0

and now the sr port can be used as root part, but is there any reason behind this ?

Might have been a mistake. Basically, parts that can (or, are allowed to be) used as a root part, have connecting nodes at the top *and* bottom.

The Shielded Clamp-o-tron doesn't have a node at the top, but the Sr. docking port does, so indeed, should be a root-part..
